availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Carter W. Tiller (Louisville deputy city marshal)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, deputy city marshal. Virginia native. Married to Mary Tiller. Deputy city marshal in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 2, p. 364. Find A Grave, “Carter W. Tiller (August 25, 1818-January 18, 1897),” Memorial #77034411, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=77034411 (accessed June 5, 2017).
